name: Deprived
description:
Explore a mysterious, maybe dangerous, underwater cave using only your ears. Made in a week for Weekly Game Jam 49 (Explore the Void).

Controls (also in game):

  • up/down arrow: move forward/backward
  • left/right arrow: turn side to side
  • space: interact (when prompted)

Free sound credits:
